thread.section_title: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Champs-Elysees - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Service, location & facilities - Fantastic
thread.title_full: Service, location & facilities - Fantastic - Review of Maison Albar Hotel Paris Champs-Elysees, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Roshmag
title: Service, location & facilities - Fantastic
text: Would not hesitate recommending thsis hotel whilst staying in Paris, it is the perfect location - a stones throw from the arc de triomphe, champs elysee and easy walking distance to the effiel tower. In regards to other areas it is so easy to access from here due to the close proximity to metro stations. The staff were so helpful which imo makes a hotel 5*, treated excellent from arrival to departure. Shower was excellent, powerful and hot. Bed was also extremely comfy. Would definately stay again!!
